description: When I reinstalled my OS to upgrade to 20.04 (Studio), this app came preinstalled, but it wouldn't open. I tried uninstalling and reinstalling from Snap Store, but issue persisted. Installed using script from main website (Version 0.9.24) and works fine now.
Shows thumbnails of photos ready to download, but clicking on download does nothing.

It checks your existing folders for existing copies photos you're about to download and doesn't download duplicates. It has many useful features and different folder naming/organization schemes to choose from. Worked just fine for me on Ubuntu 20.04.
This is a super helpful utility app. Although I just used it for the first time, it seems super useful to my workflow.

I have tried this package many times over several years. It never actually downloaded photos from an external USB device or phone in Ubuntu (12.04 LTS and up.) I connected it today and it downloaded from my Xiaomi Mi Note 10 on the first try!! No more config problems! IT JUST WORKS! For now at least. All in all, a very pleasant surprise. Good Work.
Renaming options, more reliable than shotwell, easier than CLI gphoto2
summary: Renaming options, more reliable than shotwell, easier than CLI gphoto2

description: It has all the features I need. Nice UI and great timeline. Thanks!
A good app, but cannot add sub-second data to photo filename!

It will not install from the software app you must use a script from their website. It does the install but no icon and no information on how to start program. It may have great reviews but the installation needs serious work.

I wanted to download all 5,000+ photos I had on my iPhone. When I plugged my phone in, it only recognized about 1,600 photos and when I tried to download them, it was far from "rapid" (it took nearly 2 hours). I ended up manually downloading them from iCloud.
One click to organize any bunch of files into neat folders and upload to a backup location anywhere
summary: A must-have for a photographer using Linux
Gutes Programm zum Speichern- und Umbenennen von Bildern und Videos

description: Funktioniert absolut reibungslos. Bis dato keine Fehler entdeckt. Bedeutend besser als Shotwell, welches immer mit Macken behaftet war.
Fue el unico que me reconocio mi cámara Canon viejita, y me organizo los archivos perfecto en su fecha y todo. Muy Bueno. Excelente!
Je renomme mes fichiers photos en fonction de la date de prise de vue et ce logiciel le fait très bien.
ne se lance pas et ne se désinstalle pas une solution SVP?
